channel.title: Group 3 on e-Magazine
channel.description: Recent content in Group 3 on e-Magazine

item.title: Why fear when I am here?
item.description: Bhagawan says, “Why fear when I am here”. “Fear” means fear of anything, imaginary or real, danger, disaster, or death. “When” means anytime, or all the time. “I am here” means “I am everywhere, I AM IN YOU and not outside you, not separate from you, wherever I am; in Prashanthi Nilayam, Brindavan or anywhere else. In conclusion, we have no reason to fear as we have the Lord in our midst and have Him placed in our hearts.

item.title: Painting with Calligraphy Art
item.description: The background painting was inspired by pastel blue and pink aesthetics. A 95th birthday wish to Baba was lettered in calligraphic font. Some of Swamiâ€™s incredible quotes were written as well. Some details and decorations were added too. Gallery References https://youtu.be/9RwKGTMFhbo
